CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 30, 1957, pg. A14 reads: "Military Wedding - S/Sgt. and Mrs. William J. Burrell walk through an honor guard arch following their Saturday wedding at the Greater Pittsburgh Air Base Chapel. The bride is the former Bernice Johnson of Beltzhoover.  The groom is a Philadelphian. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: best man Sergeant Lonnie Colley, groom Staff Sergeant William J. Burrell, Chaplain Charles Reider, bride Bernice Johnson Burrell wearing dress with short puffed sleeves and floral jacquard scalloped stripes on skirt, matron of honor Dewyn Kemp, and unknown woman and man, posed in NCO Club ballroom
